alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 4:50PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fremont and eastern Clark Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 449 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Island Park Reservoir, or 16 miles east of Idmon, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ponds Lodge, Last Chance, Shotgun Village, Island Park Reservoir, Sheridan Reservoir and Harriman State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Island Park Reservoir, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
